author: Joanna Slater, Niha Masih, Joanna Slater, Niha Masih
title: Millions of Indian labourers forced to walk hundreds of miles home due to coronavirus lockdown
description: 'We're doomed. If we don't die of the disease, we'll die of hunger,' one man says
content:
The workers set out on foot in the wee hours of the morning for villages hundreds of miles away, walking along the roads they helped build and past apartment towers they helped raise.
Chandra Mohan, a plumber in a suburb of Indias capital, left at 3am on Fri… [+6497 chars]
